comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called THE WINDOW FRAME, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Hi, Thanks for your comment! I'm glad you liked this image and it's really unusual to have a hand sketched frame included around a window frame like this. I'd love to know what was actually below the window???
